job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: The Global Analytics team at Chubb is seeking a data scientist with 02 years of experience to join our fastpaced high energy team responsible for delivering predictive models to our business partners in order to influence business metrics positivelybrbrThis position offers the opportunity to experience a wide variety of technology tools and business problems as well as unique challenges in problemsolving The focus is on applying a combination of industry standard practices and innovative ideas using data from multiple sources structured and unstructured and applying machine learning and statistical techniques to build models evaluation of models and supporting implementation of modelsbrbrstronguThe Roles Requiresbrustrongul liCollaborate with business partners and peers in the organization to understand and scope the problem gather business requirements and plan projects tasks and timelinesli liExecute all aspects of analytics initiatives including exploratory data analysis model development model evaluation and benefit estimationli liResearch recommend and implement statistical and other mathematical methodologies appropriate for the given model or analysisli liCreate excellent working relationships with business partners across the Chubb organization IT and analytics peer groups li liEffectively communicate results in written oral and presentation formatsli ulul liDataAnalytics background with programming experience in Python requiredli liThe ability to write SQL a good understanding of databases and approaches to extracting data a mustli liGood understanding of data mining predictive modeling and data visualizationli liText Analytics Natural Language Processing experience is a big plusli liHandson experience with emerging big data technologies li liThe ability to multitask learn new things quickly excellent problem solving amp communication skills a mustli liCollaboration knowledge sharing and keeping up to date on
